query:
select distinct 'domain', d.name  || ' > ' || ds.businessname from damdomain d inner join damdataset ds on d.id = damdomain_id inner join admdatasource dts on ds.admdatasource_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all
select distinct 'domain - header' , d.name  || ' > ' || dh.label from damdomain d inner join damheader dh on d.id = damdomain_id inner join admdatasource dts on dh.admdatasource_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all
select distinct 'domain - ref field' , d.name  || ' > ' || dr.name from damdomain d inner join damtranscofield dr on d.id = damdomain_id inner join admdatasource dts on dr.admdatabase_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all
select distinct 'query', q.name from qymquery q inner join admdatasource dts on admdatasource_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all 
select distinct 'query - shedule', q.name from qymquery q inner join qymschedule sch on q.id = qymquery_id inner join admdatasource dts on datasource_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all 
select distinct 'subquery', b.name || ' > ' || sub.name from bymquery b inner join bymsubquery sub on b.id = bymquery_id inner join admdatasource dts on admdatasource_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all 
select distinct 'bymquery - shedule', b.name from bymquery b inner join qymschedule sch on b.id = qymquery_id inner join admdatasource dts on datasource_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
union all 
select distinct 'suggest', s.name from comsuggest s inner join admdatasource dts on db_id = dts.id where dts.name = ':datasource:'
name: GTI - List controls where datasource param is used
